member.summary: A class that loads all of the FogCreek Plugin custom attributes and a few others relevant to plugin identity.

member.name: M:FogCreek.Plugins.PluginAttributes.#ctor(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Creates a PluginAttributes object from the attributes of the assembly. Throws an ArgumentException if the assembly does not have a FogCreek.Plugins.AssemblyFogCreekPluginIdAttribute. The attributes are read as follows: AssemblyFogCreekPluginIdAttribute -> sId AssemblyTitleAttribute -> sName AssemblyCompanyAttribute -> sAuthor AssemblyDescriptionAttribute - > sDescription AssemblyFileVersionAttribute -> sVersion AssemblyFogCreekMajorVersionAttribute -> iAPIMajorVersion AssemblyFogCreekMinorVersionMinAttribute -> iAPIMinorVersionMin AssemblyFogCreekEmailAddressAttribute -> sEmail AssemblyFogCreekWebsiteAttribute -> sWebsite
